summary:
Spring
is just around the corner, but not everyone is excited about the rain showers it'll
bring! The new Rainy Day Pokémon...
caption:
Spring is just around the corner, but not everyone is excited about the rain showers it’ll bring! The new Rainy Day Pokémon Figure from the A Day with Pikachu collection features the typically energetic Pikachu in a bit of dour mood. The dreary showers have left poor Pikachu soaked—and that raincoat only helps so much!


Pikachu might be pouting, but the Rainy Day Pokémon Figure from Funko is certain to bring cheer to fans when it arrives in the Pokémon Center later this month. Subscribe to the Pokémon Trainer Club newsletter to stay up to date and learn when the Rainy Day Pokémon Figure will be available for purchase.

tags: Hollow Knight llegará en formato físico con edición de colección
summary: Hollow Knight llegará en formato físico con edición de colección
title: Hollow Knight llegará en formato físico con edición de colección
body:
Team Cherry y Fangamer han confirmado que Hollow Knight para Nintendo Switch se lanzará en formato físico a través de Fangamer a finales de mayo. Esta edición física contará con dos versiones diferentes: una estándar y otra para coleccionistas. La edición estándar, que cuesta $29 dólares para PlayStation 4 y PC y $34 dólares para Switch, […]

La entrada Hollow Knight llegará en formato físico con edición de colección aparece primero en Versus Media México | Videojuegos, Cine, Tecnología, TV, Cultura..


Hollow Knight llegará en formato físico con edición de colección

summary: PQUBE HOPES KOTODAMA: THE 7 MYSTERIES OF FUJISAWA WILL SUBVERT YOUR EXPECTATIONS AND SURPRISE YOU
title: PQUBE HOPES KOTODAMA: THE 7 MYSTERIES OF FUJISAWA WILL SUBVERT YOUR EXPECTATIONS AND SURPRISE YOU
body:
Kotodama: The 7 Mysteries of Fujisawa is PQube’s first game that they’re actually taking part in development. While the game certainly fits in line with titles PQube has published in the past, they’re hoping this visual novel can manage to surprise you. Check out PQube’s statement on the game below.

When you’ll first play it, you’ll notice that it’s born out of things that we like. It’s a little bit unusual, and we’re known for picking games that are a bit odd in a lot of different ways. That’s what we like and I guess it’s our signature.

We want to have something that when you look at the key art and the box, you’ll have a preconception of what this game is, and we hope to be able to kind of subvert that a little bit and surprise you. We’d like you to say “this is totally not what I was expecting it to be.”

summary: FORTNITE - SEASON 8 ITEM SHOP LEAK REVEALS TONS OF UPCOMING GOODIES
title: FORTNITE - SEASON 8 ITEM SHOP LEAK REVEALS TONS OF UPCOMING GOODIES
body: Season 8 of Fortnite is upon us, but it’s just the start. Wondering what the item shop is going to offer as the season rolls on? Wonder no more, as dataminers have pulled a ton of content from the game’s code. Sift through the gallery above to check out what skins, emotes, and more are on the way.

reblog.comment: Season 8 of Fortnite is upon us, but it’s just the start. Wondering what the item shop is going to offer as the season rolls on? Wonder no more, as dataminers have pulled a ton of content from the game’s code. Sift through the gallery above to check out what skins, emotes, and more are on the way.

summary: Nintendo Of America: "Turn Your Sound Up To Hear The Main Theme Song From Fire Emblem: Three Houses"
title: Nintendo Of America: "Turn Your Sound Up To Hear The Main Theme Song From Fire Emblem: Three Houses"
body:
Nintendo Of America: “Turn Your Sound Up To Hear The Main Theme Song From Fire Emblem: Three Houses”

Nintendo of America has tweeted out the main theme for Fire Emblem: Three Houses, which launches worldwide on the Nintendo Switch on July 26th. This is the first time that fans are able to hear the English version of the song, complete with English lyrics. We’ve included the official tweet for you down below, so if you want to, feel free to check it out.

https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica/statu…

View On WordPress

summary: New episode of Ninchronicles! This time we’re taking a look at the early GBA RPG, Golden Sun! A charming game with a focus on...
caption:
New episode of Ninchronicles! This time we’re taking a look at the early GBA RPG, Golden Sun! A charming game with a focus on psychic powers that are useful both in and out of battle. 

The art of Isaac was done by Tobias! Check him out here: https://twitter.com/tod1n

summary: Splatoon 2 Will Be Updated To Version 4.5.1
title: Splatoon 2 Will Be Updated To Version 4.5.1
body:
Splatoon 2 Will Be Updated To Version 4.5.1

Another update is heading to Splatoon 2, but it is not packed with features. The new update will put the game at Version 4.5.1 and there is no estimated time or date for the update. Version 4.5.1 will fix an issue with Clam Blitz on the Piranha Pit map. This particular issue sometimes makes the game crash, which is a big problem. Hopefully the update arrives sooner rather than later. We shall let…

View On WordPress

summary: Top 8 Cutest Video Game Characters!!!!
title: Top 8 Cutest Video Game Characters!!!!
body:
These are just my opinion btw 

These are 8 characters from games that I find downright adorable!! 

I’ll try only to include only two per franchise 


1. Eevee (Pokémon)  


2. Kirby 

3. Mugman (Cuphead) 

4. Pikachu (Pokémon) 

5. Waddle Dee (Kirby)

6. Yoshi (Super Mario Bros) 

7. Isabelle (Animal Crossing) 

8.  Starfy (The Legendary Starfy) 

Just wanted to do this for fun :3

blog.name: luigiyoshi2210
blog.title: Like my art? You must reconsider XD
blog.description: Super Mario // The Walking Dead Game // Sherlock // Supernatural // Zootopia// Detroit: Become Human // Jess Glynne // Bastille // Mumford & Sons// Gorillaz // Has too many fandoms but draws about two or three of them // Is trying to focus on the ones I have right now before I like something else // Likes throwing my precious bois into some fandoms and makes a lot of crossovers // Luigi and Yoshi are the best // Light-hearted but also dark, obsessed with gay and can force it on any character I wish (uhhh)

summary: [Japan] Yo-Kai Watch 4 To Release On June 6th
title: [Japan] Yo-Kai Watch 4 To Release On June 6th
body:
[Japan] Yo-Kai Watch 4 To Release On June 6th #NintendoSwitch

In this week’s issue of CoroCoro Magazine that will be releasing this friday, a release date for Yo-Kai Watch 4 was revealed. The Nintendo Switch game will be releasing in Japan on June 6th.

This nugget of information is part of a larger article in CoroCoro Magazine providing coverage of Yo-Kai Watch 4. While it it is still not known when Yo-Kai Watch 4 will be making its to the West, we will be…
